changes.description: Removed package executables (bin/manage_cicd.dart). The CLI must now be invoked via scripts/.
changes.migration_guide: Use `dart run scripts/manage_cicd.dart` instead of `dart run runtime_ci_tooling:manage_cicd`.

changes.description: Updated CI template secret names and removed SendGrid/LFS support.
changes.migration_guide: Update GitHub Actions workflows to use new secret names (e.g., GEMINI_API_KEY instead of CICD_GEMINI_API_KEY_OPEN_RUNTIME) and remove LFS configuration if not needed.
